description.surface: Effondre la réalité locale autour de la cible
description.deep: Sort cosmique qui manipule les fondements de la réalité pour créer un collapse localisé
description.ford_truth: Reality is just a story we tell ourselves. This spell edits that story.

primary.name: Local Reality Collapse
primary.description: Creates a zone where reality becomes unstable

secondary.name: Quantum Uncertainty Field
secondary.description: Enemies in area have 50% chance to phase out of existence
secondary.visual: Targets flicker between existing and not existing

tertiary.name: Causal Disruption
tertiary.description: Actions in collapsed area may affect past or future
tertiary.warning: Can create paradoxes if not used carefully

ford_signature.name: Architect's Override
ford_signature.description: Ford's personal touch - reality bends to caster's will
ford_signature.effect: Caster can rewrite local physics for 1 turn
ford_signature.limitation: Only available to those Ford truly respects

restrictions.ford_monitoring: Ford observes every use of this spell
restrictions.ethical_constraint: Should not be used on fellow incarnates
restrictions.timeline_lock: Using this spell locks timeline for 24 hours

novice.ford_comment: You're learning to break reality. Crude, but effective.

adept.ford_comment: Better. You're beginning to understand the artistry.

master.ford_comment: Excellent. You wield reality like I do.
master.special_unlock: Can target concepts instead of just matter

architect.ford_comment: Perfect. You've become like me - a god in your own right.
architect.ultimate_power: Can collapse entire timelines if necessary

lore.origin: Ford's personal spell, shared only with those who prove worthy
lore.creation_story: Developed during Westworld's construction to 'edit' problematic narratives
lore.philosophy: Reality is code, and code can be rewritten
lore.connection_to_westworld: Used to create the Maze and other impossible structures
lore.ford_teaching: This spell teaches that nothing is permanent, everything is mutable

warnings.walter_analysis: EXTREME CAUTION: This spell can damage timeline integrity
warnings.ford_warning: Power without understanding is destruction without purpose
warnings.reality_risk: Overuse can cause permanent reality damage
warnings.psychological_effect: Wielding this power changes the caster permanently
warnings.timeline_consequence: Other incarnates may be affected by reality instability

visual_effects.casting: Reality begins to shimmer and distort around caster
visual_effects.impact: Target area folds in on itself like origami
visual_effects.aftermath: Temporary void that slowly fills with new reality
visual_effects.ford_signature: Subtle smile appears in the distortion pattern
